/* SA012010.selectListSA012010 */ SELECT A.SALEID , A.DEPOSITDATE , B.SALEDATE , B.SALERCD , B.BUYID , B.CONNAME , B.CONM2 , C.SELLAMT , C.AGENCYAMT , D.OWNERNAME , D.CITYCODE , fn_codename('03', D.CITYCODE, NULL) AS CITYNAME , D.BOROUGHCODE , (SELECT BOROUGHNAME FROM ba_citydtl WHERE CITYCODE = D.CITYCODE AND BOROUGHCODE = D.BOROUGHCODE) AS BOROUGHNAME , D.ADDRESS , I.KNAME , I.BRANCHCODE , fn_codename('02', I.BRANCHCODE, NULL) AS BRANCHNAME , I.DEPTCODE , fn_codename('05', I.DEPTCODE, NULL) AS DEPTNAME , (SELECT KNAME FROM hr_insamst WHERE DEPTCODE = I.DEPTCODE AND GRADE = '007' AND DUTY = '002' AND RETIREDATE IS NULL LIMIT 1) AS MNGRNAME FROM ( SELECT * FROM sa_ipgumscheduletb WHERE DEPOSITGUBUN = '004' AND DEPOSITYN = 'Y' ) A INNER JOIN ( SELECT * FROM sa_salemst T WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT SALEID FROM sa_salehistorytb WHERE SALEID = T.SALEID AND CHGGUBUN = '004') ) B ON A.SALEID = B.SALEID INNER JOIN sa_saledtl C ON B.SALEID = C.SALEID INNER JOIN mm_buymst D ON B.BUYID = D.BUYID LEFT OUTER JOIN hr_insamst I ON B.SALERCD = I.INSACODE WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.DEPOSITDATE BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(#S_DEPOSITDATE_FR#, '%Y-%m-%D') AND STR_TO_DATE(#S_DEPOSITDATE_TO#, '%Y-%m-%D') AND B.SALEGUBUN = '002'
AND I.BRANCHCODE = #S_BRANCHCODE#
AND I.DEPTCODE = #S_DEPTCODE#
AND I.KNAME LIKE '%$S_KNAME$%'
ORDER BY A.DEPOSITDATE ASC, D.OWNERNAME ASC, CITYNAME ASC, BOROUGHNAME ASC, ADDRESS ASC
